name: Midnight Television without TV
description:
Visit https://plantucho.itch.io/midnight-television for the TV version!

Out for a midnight stroll? Navigate through a small replica of the post-war suburbs of central and eastern Europe with  with a music that accompanies the tourist.

When loaded, click on the play area to start exploring.

Controls:

Move with WASD. Mouse to look around. Press ESC to free mouse. Press ESC again to stop execution.

Credits:

Rain Maker - 2D and 3D Rain Particle System by Unity Digital Ruby (Jeff Johnson)
